website_summaries.verdict: A versatile yet affordable charging station.
pros: Whether you want to charge 4 Joy-Cons, 2 pro controllers, your Switch, or any combination of these, this is the charger for you
A reliable charger that plugs into the Switch dock via USB
cons: The LED indicators are incredibly bright, even when the station isn't charging anything

customer_reviews.title: Strange brand name for a great item
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mainly for the Pro Controller charge/dock functionality and have been impressed with its overall value. My only beef with it, albeit minor, is the brightness level of the LEDs. I keep it in a cabinet and can still see the light through the cracks, so if you are using this in a room where bright light will be a problem at night, you will either have to unplug it or put a towel/item of clothing over it. I concede that, in looking at their product pictures, the bright LED is actually a selling point.
customer_reviews.author: theholmboy

customer_reviews.title: Great charger aside from the shaky pro controller slot
customer_reviews.text: Charges my joy-cons and pro controller as it should. However, the pro controller slot seems a bit unstable. There's a bit of wiggle when I attach the pro controller... Also, pushing the attached pro controller around a bit results in the controller to move instead of staying put, not a real big concern, but it does make me feel like the usb-c port on the switch will get damaged if the charger manages to fall off my desk. Just a heads up, especially for those that may have kids or pets that are prone to knocking things off.
customer_reviews.author: CarrotCake

customer_reviews.title: Not much to improve on here; great product
customer_reviews.text: This stand is great; for the price, it's awesome. It does exactly what it's supposed to; charges your controllers, and without having to hang them off the Switch itself leaving you to wonder if they're charged. I plug mine into the internal USB port inside the Switch dock, let them charge to full, then turn the device off when all four are green. It's easy and charges controllers quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Interwebz Admin

customer_reviews.title: Great charging solution, quality product!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased a few of the FastSnail products. They build quality products and this one is no exception. I’ve had this for over a month now and use it almost daily. I love the fact I can charge my extra Joy-cons and one of my Pro controllers with just one of the USB ports used on the Switch dock. I also like the ability to turn off the lights if I don’t want to see them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Mills

customer_reviews.title: who would have though a fast snail...
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this a few times bc I rarely charge my stuff until it is dead, but I love this product when I do use it. it lights up colors to let u know when it is charging and when it is done charging. green for go; red for stop. I'm glad I bought this product bc sometimes I don't want to put my switch in the dock bc it is charging it when it is sitting in it. if ur crazy about ur batteries going crazy from to much constant charging then this is the product for u.
customer_reviews.author: Ls

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have a few sets of joycons, and a couple pro controllers. I wanted an easier way to charge them all, and this was great. a pair of joycons and a pro controller, or two sets of joycons. I think the best detail is the switch that turns it on and off. I would hate to see the light on all night, but just turn it off, and the lights are off. I do wish that the color of the light without a joycon, and the fully charged would be different, just to help differentiate it more. but nonetheless, it's a great accessory
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for charging your joy cons.
customer_reviews.text: The simple review is that it works well, and is a great value compared to other similar units. Unit is powered by USB, so you can just plug it into the switch doc (or any usb power brick). It also has an on/off switch on the front which is nice if you want to turn the lights off (this however will turn off charging as well). The only "negative" thing I would say is just a matter of taste. The large LED light bars are pretty bright in a dim room. They do a great job indicating that the controllers are charging, but they certainly stand out. Again, this is more a matter of taste then anything.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin K.

customer_reviews.title: Turned off the lights
customer_reviews.text: I am very appreciative for this product. Ever since I got my second set of controllers, I needed a secondary form of charging. I like the difference in colors for when it is charging (red) and fully charged (green). I do have to note though, that the lights are a little bright when the lights are off and as it is in my bedroom it gets a little bothersome. However! There is an on/off switch for just an occasion. If I ever have more than three sets, I would probably purchase this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Piiku

customer_reviews.title: What I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: We had purchased a different charging dock before this one that first showed up broken and then the replacement wasn't charging properly. I got fed up and decided to try for one from Amazon. This one is a little bright, but not as bright as we thought it was going to be. It works great. The design is fine. Overall no complaints. It does it's job, it didn't show up broken, it's simple and looks clean. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Do no buy
customer_reviews.text: Can not use as the charging cord included is a Male just like the charging base... what a ripoff!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: At this time it is working well
customer_reviews.text: At this time they are working perfect.. this was for my grandchildren as Nintendo Switch we bought them came with no chargers for the joy cons.. they have only had this for less than a week. I reserve any right to change my review if things go south later.. but at this time I would purchase it again. I read reviews before purchasing this and this item had less bad reviews then the others.
customer_reviews.author: KML

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I thought that because this item had a ton of good reviews that it was a quality product. It is not, is it cheap plastic with a cord. Better off using the dock and console to charge, does not hold pro controller like shown there is no support to keep things plugged in from falling.
customer_reviews.author: A W

customer_reviews.title: Great charging dock
customer_reviews.text: This charging dock is great because not only can you charge your joy cons, you can also charge your Pro controller at the same time. The light indicators tell you immediately if your controllers are charged or not which is a great feature to have. Unfortunately the charging indicators do not work for charging the Pro controller, only the joycons. But it is still great and convenience store if you usually keep your console plugged into the TV like I do rather than using it as a handheld
customer_reviews.author: Alison P.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, effective and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Less cumbersome than trying to attach them to the Switch unit after every use. I like that it has and on and off switch so it's doesn't always have to be on without having to unplug it. Cheap and effective.
customer_reviews.author: R. Zier

customer_reviews.title: Must-have if you have 4+ JoyCons
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up because I have 4 JoyCons and can only charge 2 at once. I also have a Pro controller which docks on the other side, so I can charge 4 JoyCons and a Pro all at once. The green/red lights are fun and a nice indication if the battery is fully charged. The shape is a little awkward and fragile, so not great for transportation, so keep the box! Otherwise, a solid product
customer_reviews.author: C. Lowell

customer_reviews.title: Handy Device
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous little charger for your Nintendo Switch remotes, particularly if you have more than two. It does not take up much room and charges all four quickly. The indicator lights - red, not charged, and green, charged, is easy to see at a glance. Attaching the remotes to the unit and removing them is simple with no instructions needed. The price is great and delivery fast and free. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fastsnail who? Not to worry, very nice Joy-con charger and affordable!
customer_reviews.text: I was slightly apprehensive making this purchase, originally wanting to get the Amazon Basic charger but that was sold out. The vast number of high reviews are well deserved after it has been used for a couple of weeks. The charging base is sturdy for its purpose, does what it was intended to do, and comes at an affordable price. The LED charge indicators clearly visualize the state of the Joy-cons. My children (8 & 12) easily remove and attach the Joy-cons from the charging station daily. We do not use this for larger Switch controllers nor charging the Nintendo Switch, we will use the OEM charger for the base unit.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kraus

customer_reviews.title: Nice that it works to charge everything.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this charger because I wanted to be able to charge all 4 of my joy-cons and my pro controller. This charger does all that which is great. The LED posts at each controller turn red when charging and green when finished which is super nice. These LED posts however give no indication to the charge level of the pro controller when it is charging. There is no charge indicator of any kind that I can see. This is why it got 4 stars instead of 5 from me. Otherwise, the cable it came with the and the overall quality is good. I would probably purchase this again or recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: B. Pearce

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE- GET A DIFFERENT CHARGER
customer_reviews.text: Completely sucks. controllers that are almost completely dead don't charge- on any of the stations. very finicky and terrible to use. if you order this, and have any issues, return it while you can.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Great Device
customer_reviews.text: This charging dock is great for charging the joycons! It comes with a sturdy design and plugs into a USB port. I charged on my desktop computer. I love that it comes with an on/off switch so you can turn it off and leave the joycons there until you need them too. I tried to charge my switch on it but it was really slow on the USB I did not try to charge my switch using the switch's power cord yet but I am sure it would be much faster that way. I am happy with this dock and would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: FaerieTxn

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awesome low priced charger
customer_reviews.text: Works well so far. I’ve only had it a week but it charges my extra joy con and a pro controller. It doesn’t come with instructions but it’s pretty simple to use once I realized it had an on/off switch on one side. It kinda blends in which is cool, but it blended in so well I missed it initially and thought it wasn’t working. It will work off the USB port on the Switch’s dock or I imagine any other USB port, otherwise you’ll need a outlet adapter to plug it into the wall. No biggie but it’s not included, which I feel is fair given the price I paid
customer_reviews.author: Sean Mac

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing. One small complaint.
customer_reviews.text: THis thing works exactly as needed, it charges, has charge indicators, and can even dock a pro controller. My only complaint is the pro-controller dock is only held by the USB-C port, not very sturdy if it were to fall, but thats not even my biggest concern. The biggest issue is the way you cant see the port and have to turn the controller port-down to plug it in. With no guides or indicators, most of the time it ends up being like fumbling for the key hole in the dark with ur keys to the front door. I wish it had some way to guide procontroller.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Switch Controller Charger!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Switch controller charger! Can charts 4 Joy-Cons at once or a Pro Controller & 2 Joy Cons. This unit charges via USB so you can plug it into the Switch dock or side of the TV. Does NOT come with a wall adapter, but if that is how you wanted to use it, any USB wall charger will do. Lights show charging status and look cool glowing on my TV stand! Please click the "Helpful" button below if you read this review!
customer_reviews.author: Casey JonesTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: charges when lights on
customer_reviews.text: We just got a switch with 4 Nintendos for the kids so needed something to recharge all of them at the same time. It's easy for my husband and I to attach the controllers but harder for the kids, so I'm often finding them just sitting next to the charger. It seems that it only charges when the button is "on" but then it also turns on the charging light. We keep it in our bedroom though so don't want that when sleeping. Other than the light issue and kids not able to attach it, it's still a good item for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Great little charger. Comes with very few instructions and I had to hit the internet to find out how to charge my pro controller (you have to force it down into the connector much harder than you would assume) but now I use it often and it’s a great way to make sure I always have a controller ready to go when I want to okay with my Switch! I recommend it highly!
customer_reviews.author: werewulf!!

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: My husband complained incessantly about the controllers never being charged because he was limited to charging them along with the console. This device is compact, easy to use, the lights give a clear indication of whether the controller is charged or not, and it can be used to charge other things. Great bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: Came in clutch
customer_reviews.text: My daughters switch stopped charging the joy cons and we had no I idea what to do. That’s when I found this guy on amazon and I saved the day. After a couple hours the joy cons were charged and we were off playing Mario cart again. It has the ability to charge up to 4 at a time making it perfect for my family, and if you have a large controller this charges that too! I definitely recommend and would buy again but with this quality product I won’t have to.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Halstead

customer_reviews.title: Do you need this? Probably not..
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 kids(3,5,7). They aren't playing the switch long enough to warrant needing to charge all 4 at the same time. We are playing the switch like 1-2 MAX a day. We can actually rotate the joycons on charging and haven't had a dead controller yet. If you are playing for a LONG time and have the controllers nearly dead at the end of playing than this make sense to use and have. But for occasional use- you certainly dont need this.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with NES classic switch controllers
customer_reviews.text: For the typical joycon, this is a perfect solution. However I got this specifically to charge my NES classic controllers I bought from Nintendo for classic NES online games. This is only compatible with the joycon controllers and will not work with the classic NES wireless controllers for the switch. Be careful plugging in your controller into the USB C plug because you can easily scratch up the shiny top.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Great Joy-Con Charging Dock
customer_reviews.text: This is a great choice for anyone looking to charge additional Joy-Con and Pro Controllers. As our set-up is now, we have 4 Joy-Con and 2 Pro Controllers. This dock can charge either 2 Joy-Con and 1 Pro Controller, or 4 Joy-Con simultaneously. It's a small shortcoming, but I would have liked the option to charge 2 Pro Controllers at once. Currently, we charge two JC on the Switch itself, 2 on this dock, and 1 of the 2 Pro Controllers. It means there's always an orphan that may not get charged, but it's easy enough to swap out the Pros when you're playing.
customer_reviews.author: Casey M.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for joy con charging
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly for charging my son's extra joy-cons. The lights let him know when they are fully charged as well, which is helpful to him (he's young). He doesn't have a wireless controller, so I'm unsure how well it charges those, but it does not charge the switch console in that spot no matter how hard I try. Which is fine, it connects to the docking station anyway, so it doesn't inconvenience us. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality and doesn’t work properly
customer_reviews.text: Does not charge controller or switch . Very cheap quality
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Damaso

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work right out of the box. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: It never took a charge. Tried using multiple cords but it never charged my devices. I mean, it looks cool and I’m sure it works great when it does work, but I guess I lucked out and ended up junking it. Shame, too.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. All controllers side in and out with no lock. Pro controller nestled into the charge port well. Controllers feel secure while charging. Lights are a little bright, but the unit has an on/off switch when the controllers aren’t charging. Lights indicate charge status noticeably, so that’s good. Charger came with everything needed to operate the charger from the Switch dock USB port, but no outlet brick. Charger is lightweight, but appears to be robust in construction. Would recommend for someone with extra joy-cons and a pro controller.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ferris

customer_reviews.title: No Instructions
customer_reviews.text: I can say I am happy to be able to charge 4 controllers at once. I am also very happy you can turn the bright glowing charger lights off so you get some sleep at night! My only problem was that there wasn’t an instruction on how to use it. It was a guessing game for me to figure out how to hook the controllers into the docks. I would have liked a charger block included because this charger only comes with a cable.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This product works very well the only issue I have with it is the lack of support for the controller. The only thing attaching and supporting the controller is the tiny metal charging piece that goes into the controller. This puts stress on the small piece and could lead to it breaking off inside the controller. I think they should make a more sturdy seat that supports the controller while charging
customer_reviews.author: Supernova Elle

customer_reviews.title: Funtional. Easy to use. Helps us feed our students' video game addictions.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our youth group program at church. Our Switch station is always in use, and always has a line. This allows us to keep our many controllers charged (provided we remember to charge them), so that our students destroy each other in Smash Bros every Sunday (in the name of Jesus, of course). Almost a year into owning this: it still works great, charges great.
customer_reviews.author: Lizz + Michael

customer_reviews.title: Best Switch Accessory
customer_reviews.text: I never take my Nintendo Switch off the dock as I use it on my TV 100% of the time. When the battery runs low on my joy-cons I use this charger to charge them back up. It is plugged into my computer via USB and with the green and red light indicators I can tell when my joy-cons are still charging, or when they are ready for action again. You can charge 2 pairs of joy-cons at the same time, or 2 joy-cons and a controller. The lights are bright in a dark room, and do not bother.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get joy-cons seated correctly
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice with the lights and all. Charges fine. Have more difficulty than I should getting the joy-cons properly slotted in. Maybe it’ll get easier with practice.
customer_reviews.author: D354

customer_reviews.title: This works great!  With one small problem....
customer_reviews.text: I have extra controllers for Mario Party and this keeps them charged. It is just VERY VERY VERY BRIGHT when turned on. Fortunately there is an off switch to turn off the super bright lights. Once it is off the controllers will again discharge the batteries. I simply turn it on when I know there will be a Mario Party or extra players and let the batteries charge up. Then I turn it off because the lights are so bright. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Compton

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but came defective
customer_reviews.text: Charger came quick but appears to be defective. One of the charging indicators never updates from red to green. We have no idea when the joycon is fully charged. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Parkland_C6

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything about this charger! Holds 4 joy con controllers and let's you know when they're done when the light turns green from red. Also comes with a usb cord that you can plug to the back of the switch. Also comes with an on and off switch so you dont have to keep unplugging to cut the power. Couldnt be happier with the purchase and shipper!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for charging multiple controllers. It is bright to see which is charging and which is full. It charges fast too! Just what we needed and after several months, it's still working perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Katie T

customer_reviews.title: Effective but I worry about how long it'll last or whether it'll break
customer_reviews.text: This charger has space for multiple joycons and my pro controller. It charges them effectively. My concern is just that the charging dock for the pro controller is going to break at some point. The charging plug sticks up from the base of the charging station and you have to push the controller in just right in order to fit it onto the plug. It's a pain in the butt, and I worry that I'll push it the wrong way at some point and end up snapping the plug off.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Good for charging joy cons and pro controller. Will not charge Switch.
customer_reviews.text: Works well enough for charging joy cons and the pro controller but the image where it's charging a switch is misleading. Tried that and it does not work. Nor would I keep it there if it did work. There's nothing to hold the switch in place on the little USB C receiver so it feels like it would fall over and break the port of bumped. Wish I could turn the lights off while charging. Does have a switch to turn the entire device in and off to eliminate the lights though.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Great charging station for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Needed a quick and easy way to keep 4 Switch controllers charged up and ready to go, especially for games like Mario Party. We keep our switch docked so it is much easier to use an external charging solution. Do note that you need a usb power supply to connect the included usb charge cable. We plugged ours into our usb charging station for power and that works well. Some might find the big light towers distracting but we do not leave ours by the tv and they make it easy to tell when the controllers are charged up. This is a great value over getting the Nintendo solution.
customer_reviews.author: S. Zerfas

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use charging station
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for Christmas to go with my son's new Switch. It's incredibly easy to use, which is perfect since I'm making him responsible for keeping his game system charged. At the end of the day, he pops the controllers and screen in place and in the morning everything's charged up. I'm very happy with the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Ken M. Ozawa

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, it works as expected
customer_reviews.text: I received the charging station in a timely fashion. It arrived undamaged in good condition. I used it to charge my Joycons once so far and it worked as expected. I don't have enough experience with the charger to comment on its sturdiness since I just got it. I will post an update after I've used it more.
customer_reviews.author: J. Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this thing. Cheaply made. Super bright lights are purposeless and irritating. Not constructed in a way that the paddles slide in easily. Seriously terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: This had been such a useful accessory for my extra set of joycons and my pro controller. The only downside is that it's a little hard to get the pro controller in. I usually have to pick this up to get the right angle to plug my pro controller into it. I wish I could just drop it in like the switch drops into its base.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Very good with a few minor quibbles
customer_reviews.text: This does the job, but a couple quibbles. First, it’s a little clunky getting the joycons in it. Not end of world, but I wonder if other chargers are better. Second, it puts out a lot of light. Again, not terrible, you might like it, but it almost lights up the whole room at night.
customer_reviews.author: Sureshoe

customer_reviews.title: All the basics covered
customer_reviews.text: Like the power switch. I can turn off the charger so I don’t keep the room lit with the led after charging. charges my 8bitdo snes30 pro controller as well as a joycon set. decent price. no power supply but I plug into usb slot on my switch dock so no problem for me to use the included usb cord.
customer_reviews.author: J. Christianson

customer_reviews.title: Good to charge multiple things at once
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so that we could charge 4 joy cons at once - my 12 yr old is super happy! He's been charging his pro controller and 2 joycons on it - on/off switch works nicely, very easy to see when things are charged, and for my son - very easy to attach the items to the charger and start charging. He had some trouble with another one that the joycons slide into - no issues with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: darr

customer_reviews.title: charges all four joycons at the same time
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my nintendo switch. i use it for joy cons as of now don’t have a controller but i do plan on getting one soon. has a red and green light to show charging and also has an on/off button to stop charging when ever you want. it is very bright and small enough to place it anywhere without getting in the way
customer_reviews.author: Yessenia Luna Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product, not worth it
customer_reviews.text: The colored bars are supposed to be red for charging and green for charged, but when I put my controllers on the base the colored indicator lights randomly change even if the battery isn’t full. There is no rhyme or reason as to why the colors change.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Watson

customer_reviews.title: Works great, however, do not make the simple mistake I have made:
customer_reviews.text: The charger is perfect and works like a charm. However do not make the same (stupid) mistake that I have: when you plug in the charger, dont forget to flip the switch on the charger stand from -off- to -on- in order for it to light up. Would recommend this to anyone who plays rather often.
customer_reviews.author: Bullethammer

customer_reviews.title: Looks Nice
customer_reviews.text: This unit is well built. Has a very nice on off switch. The USB cable is a good length. The color will change when the controller is full charged from Red to Green. It doesn't seem to fit all controllers. Does not work with the Nintendo Switch NES controllers. Besides that a nice unit.
customer_reviews.author: deathknight8338

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t actually charge
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice but doesn’t work, when my friends would use the controllers that were set on the charging station I would notice it was never at a full charge.
customer_reviews.author: Frantz

customer_reviews.title: Great for charging multiple controllers
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect! We have 3 sets of controllers for our switch and many times only 1 would be charged and the others dead or dying. This is a very convenient way for us to charge the two other sets at the sane time. I love that the lights on the unit turn green once the controllers are fully charged. Recommended for those with multiple controllers
customer_reviews.author: tiffyb

customer_reviews.title: doesn't fully charge
customer_reviews.text: It appeared this was charging, but after using it just a few times it seems that it never fully charges up the joycons. They would appear as "green" but then when i would use them one or both would only last for a short period of time. This was the case on 2 sets of joycons. I purchased a different charger and and now both sets are fully charging. Unfortunately i didn't realize this was in issue quick enough to return the charger.
customer_reviews.author: CJK

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: This product was so inexpensive that I did not have high hopes, but I seriously adore the design - it is very easy and intuitive to use, and the color indicators are so fun. What can I say, I'm not a kid anymore but I still love colorful lights (and nintendo games).
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: My son’s controllers couldn’t be used for a long time because the console itself got damaged. This has allowed him to charge and use the controllers again. It’s also very easy to know when it’s charging and when it’s done as the base lights up and changes color when it’s fully charged.
customer_reviews.author: Amy D

customer_reviews.title: It's good but..
customer_reviews.text: When you place your Pro controller on it upside down the ONLY thing holding it in place is the USB C insert, so it's very unstable and has you thinking one day it will just break off inside your controller. Not sure what they were thinking with that sort of design.....
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L. Porter III

customer_reviews.title: Super versatile
customer_reviews.text: There are so many different ways you can charge things using this charger. I personally use it to charge a pair of joycons and my pro controller, but you can easily use it to charge two pair of joy cons or even the switch itself. The charging light indicator is super useful as well to determine when the devices have finished charging.
customer_reviews.author: James W

customer_reviews.title: Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a joycon charger when I chanced upon this listing. Was skeptical at first if it would be comparable to Hori. Took a chance and purchased this one as I can always return if not working properly. Really happy I chose to buy this one. Works perfectly with my joycons. A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie G.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Keep controls charged closer to where you sit instead of connected to the Switch and the TV. Can keep four controls charged. Has a sliding switch in front to turn on and off the device. Colored red/green lights tells you which controls are fully charged or charging.
customer_reviews.author: Nukleric

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I just wish the cord it came with was longer (but this is an easy fix so not a deal breaker). It charges my joy cons easily, and the display lighting is perfect for letting me know when they are charged. And to insert the joy cons is easy, just be a bit gentle and take your time
customer_reviews.author: Rendezvous

customer_reviews.title: This is a really nice charger, just remember to turn the power switch ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice charger, just remember to turn the power switch on. I didn't look closely at the product due to my experience with other remote control chargers that didn't have power buttons. For two days I assumed the picture was misleading about the amount of brightness the acrylic indicators had, until my significant other pointed out that the power button wasn't on.
customer_reviews.author: Precious-books.blog

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking for another charger. (Edited)
customer_reviews.text: Would give it 5 stars but unfortunately it doesn’t charge my controls all the way. It stops at half way. I leave it on the charge for hours and not even a bit goes up after it hits half. I don’t know if it’s my product specifically that’s not functioning but on another charger it charges 100% with a cable so I don’t know. It’s pretty annoying to be honest. Edit: I ended up returning it. The frustration oh needing a charger and it not working is a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: A. A.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, excellent price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Excellent value, the green and red lights make it easy to know when your controller is ready to use. Red is charging, green means fully charged. 4 controllers at once, or 2 and the portable game console. You can also charge the portable game console in your car on road trips since this runs off a USB charger cable.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry  Henz

customer_reviews.title: I love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: For some reason one of my switch joy cons was not charging while attached to the switch and plugged in, so I bought this item and after one charge cycle the joy con issue was no more, it seem to have corrected the issue, also it is able to charge my phone and function as a stand, this product is tres versitile!!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I definitely recommend this! At first I thought it was a bit small but after setting it up on my desk I realized it was the perfect size for me! Super easy to turn on and off while it stays plugged in. 10/10, great gift for anyone with a Nintendo Switch!
customer_reviews.author: Daneka Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: This charges via usb which you can plug into your switch dock. I like the on/off switch and the little light that tells you when things are charged. Rating only 4 stars because I’m not sure how long this thing will last and I just received it
customer_reviews.author: Jessica G.

customer_reviews.title: Works well, lights impress friends
customer_reviews.text: My friends are WOWED by my new joy-con charger. It lights up! It works well and I have had no issues with charging so far. so far I have only used it with joy-cons, as I use regular batteries in my pro controller, but it does not seem like it would have any trouble charging either.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed. Lights are a bit bright.
customer_reviews.text: It works and works well, putting the pro controller in the charger always makes me feel like I'm going to break it, but it's fairly sturdy so as long as you watch what you're doing you'll be fine. My only complaint is the lights can be a little bright and distracting if they're close to your TV especially.
customer_reviews.author: Skyler

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This gets the job done. It does a great job of charging all 4 of my Switch controllers at once. The light on the system is red until the controllers are fully charged, then they turn green. With the changing colors, my kids can easily tell when they are fully charged. It’s definitely worth the money and doesn’t feel like a cheap set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as a charger but could have been designed better
customer_reviews.text: Charges the joycon and pro controller just fine, however getting the joycons/pro controller in can be difficult and can be a bit hard to take out. Sadly the light is always one when charging so do not leave anywhere in your room as the lights are bright
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Perfect charger for the Switch controllers!
customer_reviews.text: Great little charger that looks cool when it lights up as well. Haven't had any charging or power issues, works well and charges pretty fast. Great design allowing us to charge all 4 controllers at the same time with a red/green led bar to notify us when its fully charged (green led).
customer_reviews.author: Scott J

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: Great charger allows you to charge 4 joy cons and a pro controller, really like the light rods that show you if its charging or if it's done green and red lights that are visible from across the room, very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Greenawalt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for charging controllers
customer_reviews.text: Great device that does as stated. Makes it easier to remember to charge the controllers as well. Color coding of charging status is convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine McLeod

customer_reviews.title: New item but possibly refurb or return?
customer_reviews.text: Just received this item. As shown on pics the seal tape was broken on one side with the box ripped and the broken seal tape was retaped with 2 stickers on the other side. Item seems to be working, lights turn on, but only time will tell. Having received a clearly not 100% new item is the reason for a 3 star review. Will update when functionality is tested. Update: Has worked fine so even if it was a return or refurb its functional.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: The product recharges 4 joycons. The lights might be too bright, but I like the colors. There is a small toggle switch in the front so you can turn off the charger when they all turn green. Overall I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: bokchoy

customer_reviews.title: Works great & looks cool.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little charger. My kid really likes that it lights up while charging. It's sturdy and does not wobble while the controller or joy cons are plugged in. It does what it says it does and does it well. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hill Country Rambler

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job!
customer_reviews.text: It works just fine. Haven't charged my switch on it due to bricking concerns, but it charges Joy Con and Pro Controllers great. Sometimes the indication lights are a little touchy. It shows green but when I put the Joy Con back in, it shows red again. But it still charges just fine so small complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: Great if you need a room light
customer_reviews.text: The LEDs are so bright it is s distraction. So either put it inside a cabinet or, well, go with something else like I decided to do. Also, the LEDs are always on as long as the switch is On. One would expect only on when something is plugged into the charging post but no, it is solid green all the time unless it is charging when it is red. It's also a bit flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: LLWarrenP

customer_reviews.title: Nice for multiple joycons
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. It is nice that I can charge all my joycons at one time and see the colors indicating if they're fully charged or not. The lights are a little bright but I don't usually need to leave it turned on overnight so it's OK in my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Megan G.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Nice charger, I have 2 joy cons and a pro controller on it. Not only does it keep them charged, I can have it near my chair so it is easy to grab and use. You have the choice of 4 joy cons or 2 joy cons + pro controller. Just the right size for me.
customer_reviews.author: D. Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Picked this thing up for $15, and it's worth every penny. The charge light can be turned off, but it also stops charging. --- That above is what clicking on the link to review populates. That being said, it works as advertised. I use it to charge my second set of joy Cons. Other than that, it isn't anything he changing.
customer_reviews.author: Corvusfan23

customer_reviews.title: Best Value!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best charging kit that is not over priced. I love this thing. Can do one pro controller and up to 4 joy cons. Nothing could beat this for 20$. I saw a switch brand charging doc for 60$ and I think that’s a rip off compared to this. 10/10 would buy/ recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kouki Chrisp

customer_reviews.title: Quick Charge, Light Indicators, Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Needed a way to quickly charge multiple controllers at once. This is the perfect charger! Fits all the chargers at one time, charges quickly, and even has lights to show whether each of the 4 are still charging or full. Great addition to your Switch collection.
customer_reviews.author: B Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love it, it lets me know when the Joy-cons are charged with LED lights. This is an amazing feature to have. Everything fits easily, it is very compact and it's easy to store/display my controllers.
customer_reviews.author: HS Mundi

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, a little sketchy for pro controller.
customer_reviews.text: This charger looks nice and is easy enough to use. I would give it 5 stars if the pro controller mounting wasn't concerning. You essentially stick it upside down on a usb-c port that's sticking straight up and that's what holds it there. I'm pretty sure it will snap off if anything bumps the controller or it were to fall.
customer_reviews.author: Carly Ginther

customer_reviews.title: Cool Product.  Nice place to store your Nintendo Remotes too.
customer_reviews.text: 5 Stars for the way you doc the Remotes. 4 Stars for the overall quality. 5 Stars for the function of the product. The way it works and Charges the Controllers. Recommend for any Nintendo Switch Users.
customer_reviews.author: Dispatch Tech

customer_reviews.title: Works, but...
customer_reviews.text: It works for most of the paddles, but not all. Purchased a ESYWEN Wireless Controller for Nintendo Switch, a 6-Axis Pro Controller Switch Remote, but it does not fit in the charging port, it has a different size from the docks port. The dock itself feels a bit flimsy, but it did charge the Wii Switch brand wireless paddles just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lo

customer_reviews.title: Dont miss the on/off switch
customer_reviews.text: This works great for 15 dollars. Well worth having to keep my extra controllers charged. When I first got it I completely missed the on/off switch on the base. And Thought I was broken. The only thing broken was my eyes. If you are in need of a charger I would give this one a try.
customer_reviews.author: Steve D.

customer_reviews.title: It's just okay.
customer_reviews.text: Nice concept. My one but big gripe is the USB C plug for the pro controller. It just sits upright with not a whole lot around it to cradle the controller. I feel like it will damage the female port on the controller over time.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great addition
customer_reviews.text: Love being able to charge all my joy cons at one time. Live that it has an on and off button so when they are charged you can turn it off. The lights are not very annoying in the dark which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Zombiemomma25

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: As someone who uses my Switch a lot, having a charger for my controllers was essential. It’s very easy to use, and my controllers are charged up for whenever I need them. This is not necessary if you plan on playing by yourself, but multiplayer scenarios where you have 3 or 4 people make this necessary. It look pretty cool too.
customer_reviews.author: Deuce

customer_reviews.title: Stops working once return window ends
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working within less than 60 days and 3 weeks after the return window ended.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Morton

customer_reviews.title: Works great with my joy cons
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my joy cons! I don’t have a pro controller yet so I haven’t been able to test that function of it! I like how small and compact it is!! And it has an off button so you can turn it off when not in use. Also like that it plugs in with USB and can plug right into the dock!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie M

product_meta.title: FastSnail Controller Charger Compatible with Nintendo Switch, Charging Dock Stand Station Compatible with Switch Joy-con and Pro Controller with Charging Indicator and Type C Charging Cable
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackAbout our Charging Stand: 

 1.Made of high quality materias.
2.Compact size with stylish design.
3.Charge up to 4 Joy-Cons or 1 Pro Controller and 2 Joy-Cons.
4.Powered via USB.
5.Charging indication.
6.Portable and solid.
7.Easy slide-in design.
8.Input Voltage: Type-C 5V DC
9.Charging Current: 500mA*4
10.Product material: ABS 

 GUARANTEED QUALITY: 

 FastSnail Tech products have been well tested before delivery, but we cannot 100% guarantee the items when shipping to you. Any problem please feel free to contact us through Amazon Email System and we will do our best to serve you. 

 Kindly reminder:
1.No include Joy-Cons and Pro Controller. 

 What you get:
1 x Charging Dock
1 x Type C Charging Cable
feature_bullets: MULTIFUNCTION - Can charging 4 Joycons or 1 Pro Controller and 2 Joycons at the same time.(No include Switch, Joycons and Pro Controller)
SIMPLE OPERATION DESIGN - Easy slide-in design & plug and play. Put your Joy-Cons or pro controller into the charging dock, and plug it into any USB port, then it will charge.
CHARGING INDICATOR - Made of 4 lampposts, they will indicate charge level for each Joy-Con. Coloured lampposts give you a visual impact.
GET READY FOR PLAY - It is safe and convenient to put your Switch Team on this display stand, and keep them organized and ready for play. It's also allows you to maintain a clean and neat desktop.

SUGGESTION - If you want to use our dock to charge your Switch Console, you can use Switch Official ac adapter to connect the dock, then the charging speed will be faster. FastSnail provide 12-Month Worry-Free Warranty and Free Lifetime Technical Support.If you are not 100% happy with the charging dock for any reason, please contact us. No questions. No charge. No kidding.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars3,597 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
